name: @rss-proxy/root
description: RSS-proxy is a tool that allows you to do create an RSS/ATOM or JSON feed of almost any website, purely by analyzing just the static HTML structure.
author: damoeb

scripts.preinstall: cd packages/core && npm i && cd - && cd packages/playground && npm i && cd - && cd packages/proxy && npm i
scripts.pretest: cd packages/core && npm test && cd - && cd packages/playground && npm test -- -c ci && cd - && cd packages/proxy && npm test
